mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon(coupon_name, coupon_type, discount_rate, discount_amount, started_at, expired_at) VALUES( #{couponName}, #{couponType}, #{discountRate}, #{discountAmount}, #{startedAt}, #{expiredAt})
mapper.select: SELECT coupon_id AS couponId, coupon_name AS couponName, coupon_type AS couponType, discount_rate AS discountRate, discount_amount AS discountAmount, started_at AS startedAt, expired_at AS expiredAt FROM coupon WHERE NOW() < expired_at AND NOW() > started_at AND ROWNUM() <= #{page} * 30 AND ROWNUM() > (#{page}-1)*30

SELECT coupon.coupon_id AS couponId, coupon_name AS couponName, coupon_type AS couponType, discount_rate AS discountRate, discount_amount AS discountAmount, started_at AS startedAt, expired_at AS expiredAt FROM coupon JOIN coupon_product ON coupon.coupon_id = coupon_product.coupon_id WHERE coupon_product.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT coupon_id AS couponId, coupon_name AS couponName, coupon_type AS couponType, discount_rate AS discountRate, discount_amount AS discountAmount, started_at AS startedAt, expired_at AS expiredAt FROM coupon WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId}
SELECT product_id AS productId, coupon_id AS couponId FROM coupon_product WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND coupon_id = #{couponId}
